     <!-- live2D ğŸ˜˜-->

<script src="/src/assets/js/live2d/js/L2Dwidget.0.min.js" type="text/javascript" />

<script src="/src/assets/js/live2d/js/L2Dwidget.min.js" type="text/javascript" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
      L2Dwidget
        .init({
           model: {

           jsonPath: "/src/assets/js/live2d/model/rem/model.json"},
           
            display: {
                "position": "left",
                "width": 250,
                "height": 400,
                "hOffset": -20,
                "vOffset": -60
            },
           mobile: { 
               show: true,
               scale: 1
           },
           desktop: { 
               show: true,
               scale: 1
           },
          dialog: {
            enable: true,
            script: {
              'every idle 10s': '$hitokoto$',
              'hover .star': 'Halloo ğŸ˜',
              'tap body': ' Yay Omess ğŸ¤¬ Otak Mesum ,aku dah ada yang poenya aa thanvank ğŸ¤­',
              'tap face': '     Apa sih ğŸ«£ sayank ğŸ˜˜ ï¼'
            }
          }
        });
    </script>
